org.cleartk.ne.term.util
Interface TermFinder

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleTermFinder
public interface TermFinder


Copyright (c) 2007-2008, Regents of the University of Colorado
All rights reserved.

This interface defines a term finder - a class which finds terms provided in one or more term lists in text.

Author:
Philip

Method Summary
 void addTermList(TermList termList)
          A term finder should typically be able to handle more than one term list.
 List<TermMatch> getMatches(List<Token> tokens)
           
 

Method Detail

getMatches

List<TermMatch> getMatches(List<Token> tokens)
Parameters:
tokens - a list of tokens corresponding to the text to look for terms in.
Returns:
all of the terms that were matched to spans of text

addTermList

void addTermList(TermList termList)
A term finder should typically be able to handle more than one term list. Furthermore, a term list makes no guarantees that the terms are unique with respect to the term texts either within a term list or across multiple term lists.

Parameters:
termList -
